[![](http://i.imgur.com/33QB0ZG.gif)](https://sharpservers.net)
Here at Sharp Servers we have always been aiming to offer the combination of high-end services in exchange of low prices.
You'll be receiving a service with guaranteed high network speed and high uptime.

**All plans include**

• OpenVZ Virtualization

• DDoS Protection up to 480Gbps

• 24/7 Monitoring

• 24/7/365 Customer Support

• Variety of choice of Linux Operating Systems

• One click OS Reinstall

• SolusVM Control Panel

• Unlimited Data Transfer

**Available Location**
France, Strasbourg (SBG-1 Datacenter) | L.G: http://fr-vps.sharpservers.net

**Featured Plans**

**_Full Plans : [https://sharpservers.net/clientarea/cart.php?gid=6](https://sharpservers.net/clientarea/cart.php?gid=6)_**
**VPS-XS (Order Link: [https://sharpservers.net/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=29](https://sharpservers.net/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=29))**

>* 10GB HDD Disk Space
>* 256 MB Guaranteed RAM
>* Unlimited Bandwidth
>* Connected to a 1Gbps Uplink
>* Guaranteed 125Mbps/port
>* 1x IPv4
>* 1 CPU Core[4.0 GHz/4.4 GHz]

> 1.5$/month


**VPS-S (Order Link : https://sharpservers.net/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=30)**

>* 20GB HDD Disk Space
>* 512 MB Guaranteed RAM
>* Unlimited Bandwidth
>* Connected to a 1Gbps Uplink
>* Guaranteed 150Mbps/port
>* 1x IPv4
>* 1 CPU Core[4.0 GHz/4.4 GHz]

> 2$/month


**VPS-M (Order Link : https://sharpservers.net/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=31)**

>* 40GB HDD Disk Space
>* 1024 MB Guaranteed RAM
>* Unlimited Bandwidth

>* Guaranteed 175Mbps/port
>* 1x IPv4
>* 2 CPU Cores [4.0 GHz/4.4 GHz]

> 4$/month
